== Naduvattom (CT) (627536) ==

Naduvattom (CT) is a town in the [[Tirur]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 14.89 sq. km. and harbouring 4060 households with total population of 21273 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Malappuram]] is at a distance of 38 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 385 km. Male population is 10074 and female population is 11199. Scheduled Caste population is 2058 and Scheduled Tribes population is 38. Census Location Code of the town is 627536<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Malappuram (m + og) at a distance of 38 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 85 km. Railway station is at Kuttippuram at a distance of 10 km.
